scripts.check: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat compile && dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat test && tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.deploy:router: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterDeploy.ts --network $NETWORK
scripts.upgrade:router: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterUpgradeV7.ts --network $NETWORK
scripts.show:router: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition visualize ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterDeploy.ts
scripts.deploy:router:prod: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterDeploy.ts --network bsc
scripts.upgrade:router:prod: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterUpgradeV7.ts --network bsc
scripts.deploy:router:test: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterDeploy.ts --network bscTestnet
scripts.deploy:router:local: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterDeploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.upgrade:router:test: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterUpgradeV7.ts --network bscTestnet
scripts.upgrade:router:local: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/dagobang/DagobangRouterUpgradeV7.ts --network localhost
scripts.verify:prod: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat verifyContract --network bsc
scripts.verify:test: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat verifyContract --network bscTestnet
scripts.verify:local: dotenv -- cross-var npx hardhat verifyContract --network localhost
scripts.verify:prod:proxy: dotenv -- cross-var NODE_OPTIONS='-r global-agent/bootstrap' GLOBAL_AGENT_HTTPS_PROXY=$HTTPS_PROXY npx hardhat verifyContract --network bsc
scripts.verify:test:proxy: dotenv -- cross-var NODE_OPTIONS='-r global-agent/bootstrap' GLOBAL_AGENT_HTTPS_PROXY=$HTTPS_PROXY npx hardhat verifyContract --network bscTestnet
